FUNCTION JULDAY_TO_TIMESTR,JDAY ;*** Converts time string with format 'DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS' to julian days *** ; CODE PROVIDED BY D. SMITH, RAL. caldat,jday,mon,day,year,hrs,mins,secs months = ['JAN','FEB','MAR','APR','MAY','JUN','JUL','AUG','SEP','OCT','NOV','DEC'] timestr = string(day,format='(i2.2)') + '-' + $ months(mon-1) + '-' + $ string(year,format='(i4.4)') + ' ' + $ string(hrs,format='(i2.2)') + ':' + $ string(mins,format='(i2.2)') + ':' + $ string(secs,format='(i2.2)') return,timestr END
